description: Xojo toolbars can be saved in three different formats depending on the selected project format. The formats include: Project (text), Binary, and XML . You do not need to have a product license in order to create the XOJO_BINARY_TOOLBAR file.

To create the XOJO_BINARY_TOOLBAR file, select Insert → Toolbar , and then name the toolbar. After you create the toolbar, select it from the left panel, then select File → Export [toolbar name]... , choose the save location, and click Save .
To import a XOJO_BINARY_TOOLBAR, select File → Import... , navigate to the file, and click Import .
NOTE: REAL Software Real Studio became Xojo, Inc. Xojo in 2013.
